title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1211.111 - Thiophosgene (thiocarbonyl-chloride)
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1211.111 - Thiophosgene (thiocarbonyl-chloride)

State Regulations

Thiophosgene (thiocarbonyl-chloride) is restricted to a
maximum quantity per vehicle of 60 gallons or 1000 pounds gross weight
provided, however, such liquid is packed in fiberboard boxes, with inside glass
bottles not exceeding one pint capacity each, or in wooden boxes, with inside
glass bottles not exceeding one quart capacity each. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1211.111

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
